subject: Would like to chat .wi.th yo.u
body:
Hire,
i am here sitting in the internet caffe. Fou!nd your email and
decided to write. I might be coming to your place in 14 days, 
so I decided to email you. M!ay be we can meet? I am 25 y.o.
girl. I have !a picture if you want. No need to reply here as 
this is not my email. Write me at pvma@JumpPost.info
